text: Kist sitamkortar az on kas, ki ʙa Xudo durūƣ ʙast jo guft, ki ʙa man vahj şuda va hol on ki ʙa ū heç ciz vahj naşuda ʙud va on kas, ki guft: «Man niz monandi ojote, ki Xudo nozil kardast, nozil xoham kard?» Agar ʙuʙinī, on goh, ki in sitamkoron dar sakaroti marg giriftorand va maloika ʙar onho dast kuşodaand, ki çoni xeş ʙerun kuned, imrūz şumoro ʙa azoʙe xorkunanda azoʙ mekunand va in ʙa çazoi on ast, ki dar ʙorai Xudo ʙa nohaq suxan megufted va az ojoti Ū sarpecī mekarded
